xmldoc.short_description: Partitions the group that is associated with the specified communicator into a specified number of disjoint subgroups.

param_input_item.param_description: an integer value: The new communicator that the calling process is to be assigned to. The value of color must be non-negative.
an integer value: The relative rank of the calling process in the group of the new communicator.

param_output_item.param_description: MPI_Comm object: handle to a new communicator.

description.p: Partitions the group that is associated with the specified communicator into a specified number of disjoint subgroups.
